title: Frontend Developer
description: Design and implement user-facing features for the CineWatch web platform, ensuring a seamless and intuitive user experience.
qualifications: Proficiency in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript
Experience with modern frameworks (React, Angular, or Vue)

title: Content Curator
description: Scout and acquire compelling films and series, with a special focus on African cinema, to enrich the CineWatch content library.
qualifications: A passion for global and local cinema
Experience in content licensing or media management

title: Full Stack Engineer
description: Build and maintain both the server-side and client-side of our applications, from database management to the front end.
qualifications: Experience with Node.js, Python, or a similar backend language
Knowledge of cloud services (AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure)

title: Motion Graphics Designer
description: Create stunning visual effects, intros, and promotional materials to enhance the CineWatch brand and content.
qualifications: Expertise in Adobe After Effects and Premiere Pro
A portfolio showcasing motion graphics work

title: Product Manager
description: Define the product roadmap, prioritize features, and work with engineering and design teams to build an amazing streaming experience.
qualifications: Proven experience in a product management role
